protocol.text: Seeds from single copy transgene 35S:His6FLAG-RPL18B (Col-0) (Zanetti et al., 2005) were surface sterilized with 95 % (v/v) ethanol for 5 min, followed by 10 min submergence in bleach solution (20 % (v/v) bleach and 0.1 % (v/v) Tween-20), rinsed ad vernal

Seven-day old seedlings were subjected to short and long  hypoxia stress (HS) treatments (2h and 9h) or allowed to recover after 9h HS for 1h in air (re-oxygenation). Treatments started at the end of the light period and took place 6.5 uM m-1 s-1 light, i

Total and polysomal RNA samples derived from three independent biological replicate experiments were used for microarray hybridization analysis. RNA samples (3 ug) were used to synthesize double stranded cDNA, using One-Cycle cDNA synthesis Kit (Affymetri

Whole seedlings were harvested into liquid nitrogen within < 3 min from release from treatment.  All mRNA extraction procedures were performed at 4 degreeC or on ice. Approximately 5 mL of pulverized tissue was extracted in 10 mL of Polysome Extraction Buffer
